name: Forest Puzzle
description:
Forest Puzzle is the game in which you need to save strange creatures called Sparks on 60 challenging levels in 3 different game modes. Deadly creatures like Golems, Zombies, Firebats and Ghosts will be pursuing you.
- Complete levels and save enough Sparks to unlock new, more challenging stages.
- Find the way to Exit Portal through the numerous puzzles in Puzzle mode.
- Rush to Exit Portal in Time trial mode. Do not forget about Sparks.
- Survive long enough to complete the level in Survival mode with endless dangerous creatures. There is no exit - for how long would you survive?
